Package org.jvault.extension

Class JvaultRuntimeExtension

java.lang.Object
org.jvault.extension.JvaultRuntimeExtension
@API public final class JvaultRuntimeExtension extends Object
Extension point of the Jvault library's behavior.
If the client implements the extensiblepoint of Jvault library and passes it to this class,
the behavior of the library is changed.

Current extensiblepoints : BeanReader

JvaultRuntimeExtension uses Optional to mean that no extension is given. Therefore, be careful not to pass type parameter Optional.
Since:
0.1

    • extend

      public static <T> void extend(T instance, Class<T> type)
      Receive extensiblepoint implementation of Jvault and change library behavior.

      If a non-extensible type parameter is passed, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the real type of ExtensiblePoint
      Parameters:
      instance - the instance of ExtensiblePoint
      type - the class type of ExtensiblePoint
      Since:

    • reset

      public static <T> void reset(Class<T> type)
      Receive extensiblepoint implementation of Jvault and reset to the default implementation of the Jvault library.

      Ignored if there is no ExtensiblePoint implementation corresponding to the passed parameter.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the real type of ExtensiblePoint
      Parameters:
      type - the class type of ExtensiblePoint
      Since:
      0.1

    • resetAll

      public static void resetAll()
      Reset all registered extensiblepoint implementations to the Jvault default implementations of extensiblepoint.
      Since:
      0.1

    • getExtension

      public <T> T getExtension(Class<T> cls)
      Internal API.
      Jvault libraries accessible to JvaultRuntimeExtension are used to obtain extension implementations.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the real type of ExtensiblePoint
      Parameters:
      cls - the class type of ExtensiblePoint
      Returns:
      T Implement of ExtensiblePoint.
